properties.areaDesc: Galveston Island and Bolivar Peninsula; Matagorda Islands; Brazoria Islands
properties.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued February 3 at 3:38PM CST until February 3 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Elevated surf and a high risk of rip currents.

* WHERE...Matagorda Islands, Brazoria Islands and Galveston
Island and Bolivar Peninsula Counties.

* WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Expect hazardous swimming conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong onshore flow has resulted in
elevated surf and increased threat of rip currents.
properties.instruction:
Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and
float. Don't swim against the current. If able, swim in a
direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the
shore and call or wave for help.

NWSheadline: BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING
